verbose_text: Very recently, it was shown that reduced expression of the putative S gene SYNTAXIN-RELATED1 (StSYR1), an ortholog of AtSYP121 / AtPEN1 of Arabidopsis, decreased susceptibility to P. infestans in potato via the RNAi approach.
evidence: expression of the putative S gene SYNTAXIN-RELATED1 (StSYR1
